authorizeoauth2access.name: AuthorizeOAuth2Access
authorizeoauth2access.description: Grants permission to authenticate through a browser and obtain an OAuth 2.0 authorization code for credential exchange

createoauth2token.name: CreateOAuth2Token
createoauth2token.description: Grants permission to exchange an authorization code for OAuth 2.0 access token and refresh token that can be used to access AWS services from developer tools and applications

createtrustedidentitypropagationapplicat.name: CreateTrustedIdentityPropagationApplicationForConsole
createtrustedidentitypropagationapplicat.description: Grants permission to create an Identity Center application that represents the AWS Management Console on an Identity Center organization instance

listtrustedidentitypropagationapplicatio.name: ListTrustedIdentityPropagationApplicationsForConsole
listtrustedidentitypropagationapplicatio.description: Grants permission to list all Identity Center applications that represent the AWS Management Console
